casebody.data:
ANIM INVESTMENT COMPANY, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
George SHALHOUB and Kathleen Shalhoub, d/b/a Gj Shalhoub, Inc., Defendants-Respondents. C-907 September Term 2017
080950 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005266-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
